## Failure.toString() method

Get a 'friendly' string representation of this object.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
toString(): string;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

string

A string representing this object.

## Remarks

The string representation of a [Failure](./ts-utils.failure.md) value is the error message.
